statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

statistics.name: offensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the offense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot.

article.description: Jordon Varnardo scored 17 points and grabbed a career-high 13 rebounds, and Troy beat Southern Mississippi 69-59 on Tuesday night.
article.headline: Troy tops southern Mississippi 69-59
article.story: TROY, Ala. -- Jordon Varnardo scored 17 points and grabbed a career-high 13 rebounds, and Troy beat Southern Mississippi 69-59 on Tuesday night. Jeremey Hollimon scored 14 points with four 3-pointers and Wesley Person added 12 points with three 3-pointers for the Trojans (4-3), who never trailed and shot 13 of 38 from behind the 3-point arc. John Walton III had 11 boards and Troy outrebounded Southern Mississippi 44-34. Varnardo, who notched his fourth double-double of the season, scored four points in Troy's 13-0 opening run. The Trojans hit five straight 3s for a 31-17 lead and were up 32-21 at halftime. Troy pulled ahead in the second half on a 13-0 run in which Person, Varnardo and Hollimon each hit 3s and led by double digits the rest of the way. Kourtlin Jackson led the Golden Eagles (0-5) with 15 points and Keljin Blevins scored 12 with 11 rebounds.
